ayah: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ ٱلۡقُدُّوسِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: yusabbihu lillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi al-maliki al-qudusi al-'azizi al-hakimi
ayah_english: Glorifies Allah whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth the Sovereign the Holy the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ فِي ٱلۡأُمِّيِّـۧنَ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi ba'atha fi al-umiyina rasulan min'hum yatlu alayhim ayatihi wayuzakkihim wayu'allimuhumu al-kitaba wal-hik'mata wa-in kanu min qablu lafi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His Verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and the wisdom although they were from before surely in an error clear

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ فِي ٱلۡأُمِّيِّـۧنَ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ فِي ٱلۡأُمِّيِّـۧنَ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His Verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and the wisdom although they were from before surely in an error clear

ayah: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: waakharina min'hum lamma yalhaqu bihim wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And others among them who have not yet joined them and He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

ayah_english: And others among them who have not yet joined them and He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
ayah_translit: dhalika fadlu al-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu dhu al-fadli al-'azimi
ayah_english: That (is the) Bounty (of) Allah He gives it (to) whom He wills And Allah (is the) Possessor (of) Bounty the Great

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

ayah: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ حُمِّلُواْ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَحۡمِلُوهَا كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡحِمَارِ يَحۡمِلُ أَسۡفَارَۢاۚ بِئۡسَ مَثَلُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: mathalu alladhina hummilu al-tawrata thumma lam yahmiluha kamathali al-himari yahmilu asfaran bi'sa mathalu al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayati al-lahi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
ayah_english: (The) likeness (of) those who were entrusted (with) the Taurat then not they bore it (is) like the donkey who carries books Wretched is (the) example (of) the people who deny (the) Signs (of) Allah And Allah (does) not guide the people the wrongdoers

ayah_translit: mathalu alladhina hummilu al-tawrata thumma lam yahmiluha kamathali al-himari yahmilu asfaran bi'sa mathalu al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayati al-lahi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina

ayah: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ حُمِّلُواْ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَحۡمِلُوهَا كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡحِمَارِ يَحۡمِلُ أَسۡفَارَۢاۚ بِئۡسَ مَثَلُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: mathalu alladhina hummilu al-tawrata thumma lam yahmiluha kamathali al-himari yahmilu asfaran bi'sa mathalu al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayati al-lahi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
ayah_english: (The) likeness (of) those who were entrusted (with) the Taurat then not they bore it (is) like the donkey who carries books Wretched is (the) example (of) the people who deny (the) Signs (of) Allah And Allah (does) not guide the people the wrongdoers

ayah: قُلۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓاْ إِن زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُاْ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qul yaayyuha alladhina hadu in za'amtum annakum awliyau lillahi min duni al-nasi fatamannawu al-mawta in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Say O you (who) (are) Jews If you claim that you (are) allies of Allah from excluding the people then wish (for) the death if you are truthful

ayah: وَلَا يَتَمَنَّوۡنَهُۥٓ أَبَدَۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wala yatamannawnahu abadan bima qaddamat aydihim wal-lahu alimun bil-zalimina
ayah_english: But not they will wish for it ever for what have sent forth their hands And Allah (is) All-Knowing of the wrongdoers

ayah: وَلَا يَتَمَنَّوۡنَهُۥٓ أَبَدَۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ ٱلَّذِي تَفِرُّونَ مِنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ مُلَٰقِيكُمۡۖ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: qul inna al-mawta alladhi tafirruna min'hu fa-innahu mulaqikum thumma turadduna ila alimi al-ghaybi wal-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: Say Indeed the death which you flee from it then surely it (will) meet you Then you will be sent back to (the) All-Knower (of) the unseen and the witnessed and He will inform you of what you used (to) do

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ ٱلَّذِي تَفِرُّونَ مِنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ مُلَٰقِيكُمۡۖ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا نُودِيَ لِلصَّلَوٰةِ مِن يَوۡمِ ٱلۡجُمُعَةِ فَٱسۡعَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَذَرُواْ ٱلۡبَيۡعَۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha nudiya lilssalati min yawmi al-jumu'ati fa-is'aw ila dhik'ri al-lahi wadharu al-bay'a dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
ayah_english: O (you) who believe When (the) call is made for (the) prayer on (the) day (of) Friday then hasten to (the) remembrance (of) Allah and leave the business That (is) better for you if you know

ayah: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةُ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-idha qudiyati al-salatu fa-intashiru fi al-ardi wa-ib'taghu min fadli al-lahi wa-udh'kuru al-laha kathiran la'allakum tuf'lihuna
ayah_english: Then when is concluded the prayer then disperse in the land and seek from (the) Bounty (of) Allah and remember Allah much so that you may succeed

ayah: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةُ فَٱنتَشِرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

ayah_english: Then when is concluded the prayer then disperse in the land and seek from (the) Bounty (of) Allah and remember Allah much so that you may succeed

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡاْ تِجَٰرَةً أَوۡ لَهۡوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمٗاۚ قُلۡ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَٰرَةِۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha ra-aw tijaratan aw lahwan infaddu ilayha watarakuka qaiman qul ma inda al-lahi khayrun mina al-lahwi wamina al-tijarati wal-lahu khayru al-raziqina
ayah_english: And when they saw a transaction or a sport they rushed to it and left you standing Say What (is) with Allah (is) better than the sport and from (any) transaction And Allah (is the) Best (of) the Providers

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡاْ تِجَٰرَةً أَوۡ لَهۡوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمٗاۚ قُلۡ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَٰرَةِۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡاْ تِجَٰرَةً أَوۡ لَهۡوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمٗاۚ قُلۡ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَٰرَةِۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ

ayah_english: And when they saw a transaction or a sport they rushed to it and left you standing Say What (is) with Allah (is) better than the sport and from (any) transaction And Allah (is the) Best (of) the Providers

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡاْ تِجَٰرَةً أَوۡ لَهۡوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمٗاۚ قُلۡ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَٰرَةِۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ
